ComicInfo.Title: The Faller of Trees
ComicInfo.Summary:
END OF STORY ARC
A 2018 Eisner Award nominee for Best Writer, JEFF LEMIRE! “THE BLACK BARN,” Conclusion
Father Fred enters The Black Barn on a daring rescue attempt but nothing can prepare him for the horrors within. Meanwhile Norton and Angie delve deeper into Norton’s past and zero in on the secrets of the Barn.
